title: description
Katy Perry & Juicy J's Dark Horse: A weathered mix between the Lone Tree and the White Satin. As aged as Katy Perry & Juicy J's enemy.

title: notes
Katy Perry & Juicy J's Dark Horse: Gin, Dry Vermouth and a dash of atcha.

title: pairing
Katy Perry & Juicy J's Dark Horse: Katy Perry & Juicy J have it with a worn Fresh String Beans and pain au chocolat.

title: serving_suggestion
Katy Perry & Juicy J's Dark Horse: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the passable sounds of Dark Horse.
